title: Best of The Herd for Jul 23, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jul 23, 2020
description:
Zion Williams has charisma and you can't teach that. The Mookie Betts' deal is great for the Dodgers. Cam shows he can do it "The Patriot Way", because Patriots will not change their culture for Cam Newton. LeBron James leading in assists this season is amazing and Kawhi Leonard will be top 5 all time if the Clippers win the title.


Guest: HOF Pitcher John Smoltz

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Zion Williams has charisma and you can't teach that. The Mookie Betts' deal is great for the Dodgers. Cam shows he can do it "The Patriot Way", because Patriots will not change their culture for Cam Newton. LeBron James leading in assists this season is amazing and Kawhi Leonard will be top 5 all time if the Clippers win the title.


Guest: HOF Pitcher John Smoltz
